TEXT.English: When checked, the shortcut keys for regenerating the map (ALT + G) and starting/stopping MapFinder (ALT + CTRL + G) are active.
TEXT.French: When checked, the shortcut keys for regenerating the map (ALT + G) and starting/stopping MapFinder (ALT + CTRL + G) are active.
TEXT.German: Aktiviert die Tastenkombinationen, um eine Karte neu erstellen zu lassen ([ALT + G]) und den MapFinder zu starten/stoppen ([STRG + ALT + G])
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the shortcut keys for regenerating the map (ALT + G) and starting/stopping MapFinder (ALT + CTRL + G) are active.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the shortcut keys for regenerating the map (ALT + G) and starting/stopping MapFinder (ALT + CTRL + G) are active.

TEXT.English: Enter the full path to the MapFinder directory. It must contain the "Rules" and "Saves" folders.
TEXT.French: Enter the full path to the MapFinder directory. It must contain the "Rules" and "Saves" folders.
TEXT.German: Eingabe des vollständigen Pfades zum MapFinder-Verzeichnis (muss die Verzeichnisse "Rules" und "Saves" beinhalten)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the full path to the MapFinder directory. It must contain the "Rules" and "Saves" folders.
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the full path to the MapFinder directory. It must contain the "Rules" and "Saves" folders.

TEXT.English: Enter the name of the rule file to use for checking maps for save-worthiness, e.g. "Precious Metals.rul".
TEXT.French: Enter the name of the rule file to use for checking maps for save-worthiness, e.g. "Precious Metals.rul".
TEXT.German: Eingabe des Namens der Regeldatei, die verwendet werden soll, um Karten auf ihre Speicherwürdigkeit zu prüfen (beispielsweise "Precious Metals.rul")
TEXT.Italian: Enter the name of the rule file to use for checking maps for save-worthiness, e.g. "Precious Metals.rul".
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the name of the rule file to use for checking maps for save-worthiness, e.g. "Precious Metals.rul".

TEXT.English: Enter the number of seconds to delay before the map is regenerated each time through the MapFinder cycle (default value is 0.0).
TEXT.French: Enter the number of seconds to delay before the map is regenerated each time through the MapFinder cycle (default value is 0.0).
TEXT.German: Eingabe der Anzahl von Sekunden, die gewartet werden soll, bevor eine Karte während eines MapFinder-Durchlaufs neu erstellt wird (der Standardwert ist 0.0)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the number of seconds to delay before the map is regenerated each time through the MapFinder cycle (default value is 0.0).
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the number of seconds to delay before the map is regenerated each time through the MapFinder cycle (default value is 0.0).

TEXT.English: Enter the number of seconds to pause before starting the next MapFinder cycle when a map fails to pass the rules and is skipped (default value is 0.25).
TEXT.French: Enter the number of seconds to pause before starting the next MapFinder cycle when a map fails to pass the rules and is skipped (default value is 0.25).
TEXT.German: Eingabe der Anzahl von Sekunden, die gewartet werden soll, bevor der nächste MapFinder-Durchlauf gestartet wird, wenn eine Karte die Regeln nicht erfüllt und übersprungen wird (der Standardwert ist 0.25)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the number of seconds to pause before starting the next MapFinder cycle when a map fails to pass the rules and is skipped (default value is 0.25).
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the number of seconds to pause before starting the next MapFinder cycle when a map fails to pass the rules and is skipped (default value is 0.25).

TEXT.English: Enter the number of seconds to pause before taking the screenshot and saving the map when it passes the rules. Note that there may be an enforced minimum to allow time for the fog of war to recover previously-revealed tiles before taking the screenshot (default value is 2.0).
TEXT.French: Enter the number of seconds to pause before taking the screenshot and saving the map when it passes the rules. Note that there may be an enforced minimum to allow time for the fog of war to recover previously-revealed tiles before taking the screenshot (default value is 2.0).
TEXT.German: Eingabe der Anzahl von Sekunden, die gewartet werden soll, bevor ein Screenshot erstellt und eine Karte gespeichert wird, wenn sie die Regeln erfüllt. Es sollte beachtet werden, dass möglicherweise ein erzwungener Minimalwert existiert, um zuvor enthüllte Geländefelder wieder mit dem Nebel des Krieges zu bedecken, bevor ein Screenshot erstellt wird (der Standardwert ist 2.0)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the number of seconds to pause before taking the screenshot and saving the map when it passes the rules. Note that there may be an enforced minimum to allow time for the fog of war to recover previously-revealed tiles before taking the screenshot (default value is 2.0).
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the number of seconds to pause before taking the screenshot and saving the map when it passes the rules. Note that there may be an enforced minimum to allow time for the fog of war to recover previously-revealed tiles before taking the screenshot (default value is 2.0).

TEXT.English: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will regenerate the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.French: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will regenerate the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.German: Eingabe der maximalen Anzahl von Neuerstellungen einer Karte, bevor MapFinder automatisch stoppt (der Standardwert ist 1000)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will regenerate the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will regenerate the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).

TEXT.English: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will save the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.French: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will save the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.German: Eingabe der maximalen Anzahl von Speicherungen einer Karte, bevor MapFinder automatisch stoppt (der Standardwert ist 1000)
TEXT.Italian: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will save the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
TEXT.Spanish: Enter the maximum number of times MapFinder will save the map before stopping automatically (default value is 1000).
